priceHistory.title: Price history
priceHistory.chart_placeholder: Price chart will be displayed here

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: The USP-S is a silenced pistol that features a removable suppressor and is known for its accuracy and low recoil. It's a favorite choice for the Counter-Terrorist side in pistol rounds.

rarity.title: Rarity
rarity.content: The Royal Blue finish is an Industrial Grade skin, making it relatively common but still sought after by collectors for its clean and classic appearance.

history.title: History
history.content: The USP-S Royal Blue was introduced in the Arms Deal update, one of the first major skin updates for CS:GO, and has remained a popular budget option.

popularity.title: Popularity
popularity.content: Despite being an older and simpler skin, the USP-S Royal Blue maintains steady popularity due to its clean design and affordable price point compared to more elaborate skins.

itemDetails.fan_favorite: A fan favorite from Counter-Strike Source, the Silenced USP Pistol has a detachable silencer that gives shots less recoil and noise.

footer.find_skins: Find all your favorite CS2 skins and items. Track prices and market trends.
footer.subscribe: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest updates on skins, prices, and market trends.
